personal.name: Bruce Blake
personal.title: Java, TypeScript & React/Angular Developer
personal.objective: Computer Engineering student at Virginia Tech with expertise in Java, TypeScript, React, and Angular. Incoming 2025 Associate Software Development Intern at Google on the Play Books team.
personal.currentFocus: Building scalable enterprise applications with Java and modern web applications with TypeScript, React, and Angular

experience.description: Incoming 2025 Associate Software Development Intern on the Play Books team.
Architected and developed a full-stack AI-driven voice ordering system serving 600+ users.
highlights: Architected and developed a full-stack AI-driven voice ordering system, integrating OpenAI's Realtime API for NLP and Twilio ConversationRelay for real-time voice processing serving 600+ users and $15,000+ in revenue
Built a multi-agent orchestration system using a FSM to manage complex conversational flows using OpenAI Agents SDK
Designed and implemented FastAPI backend services utilizing PostgreSQL for persistent storage and Redis for caching
Utilized Celery for asynchronous background task processing, such as order processing and notifications

experience.description: Trained LLMs and analyzed code quality for AI model improvements.
highlights: Tasked with training LLMs to use various tools accurately and giving written as well as coding examples and explanations
Analyzed Swift code snippets generated by LLMs to ensure accuracy with a user's prompt and update code accordingly

experience.description: Created ML-powered features for Google's internal issue tracking system.
highlights: Created an ML-powered recommendation feature for Buganizer, for issue similarity based on titles and existing hotlist data
Streamlined issue management on Google's internal company-wide issue tracker (Buganizer), a system supporting workflows for over 2.5 million monthly active users
Developed the system using Java with Apps Framework, and TypeScript with Angular, including a queue messenger
Authored design & implementation documentation, and successfully launched the feature internally within 12 weeks

experience.description: Co-founded social media startup for event management.
highlights: Co-founded a social media app startup for creating and managing events with friends
Developed features including shared calendar, event creation/joining, and real-time messaging

technicalProjects.name: AI Image Generator
technicalProjects.description: Developed a full-stack AI image generator enabling text-to-image creation and integrated Firebase for user auth.

technicalProjects.name: Stock Options Analysis Tool
technicalProjects.description: Created a full-stack options trading analytics application, featuring real-time options chain analysis, complex strategy building, and interactive P&L visualizations.

technicalProjects.name: Sudoku Solver
technicalProjects.description: Built a Sudoku game and solver application, with an advanced backtracking algorithm for puzzle solving. Implemented Firebase for user auth and a leaderboard to track best performances based on the various difficulty levels.

technicalProjects.name: Hopfield Network Toolkit
technicalProjects.description: Engineered a comprehensive educational toolkit for exploring Hopfield Networks. Implemented high-performance Hopfield Network core logic using vectorized NumPy (O(nÂ²) complexity), supporting Hebbian learning and pseudoinverse training rules, and advanced analysis tools for energy tracking and capacity testing.

technicalProjects.name: 3D Physics Engine & FPS Multiplayer Game
technicalProjects.description: Created a 3D Physics & Game Engine with multiplayer FPS game featuring role-based gameplay.
highlights: Created a 3D Physics & Game Engine as well as a game featuring role-based gameplay with scoring and leaderboards
Integrated ENet for low-latency multiplayer networking and dynamic asset loading with Assimp and stb_image

technicalProjects.name: Full Stack iOS Social Media App
technicalProjects.description: Built comprehensive social media application with authentication, events, and real-time features.
highlights: Features include authentication, friend management, groups, calendars, galleries, events, posts, pagination, location
Organized codebase with 20K+ lines of code using MVVM architecture pattern
